We need your nominations!
 

HI %FIRSTNAME%

COVID-19 has brought new challenges for us all. We want to acknowledge and recognise those who have stepped up to help within the community, whether that’s repurposing their business / enterprise to meet COVID-19 demands or by supporting those in need with their time and resources.

We invite you to nominate your Allianz commercial customers who have demonstrated this type of initiative or act of kindness. From these nominations we will randomly select 10 customers and donate €2,000 to a charity of their choice.
 
WHAT YOU NEED TO DO:

Tell us briefly how our mutual customer has played an important role and send it to us here along with the following before 30 June 2020.
 

Customer name
 

Policy number
 

Business name (where applicable)
 

Customer contact details (phone number, email and address)

So whether that’s making hand sanitiser instead of alcohol or giving free coffees to front line staff, we would love to hear their stories.
